channel.title: Need my questions answered now
channel.description: ok know i have a ::char command everything works on it but the accept button also i have mopar client lol and i know how to access the client and all but im lvl 99 and im hiting 6 on guards how do i fix my def attack and stuff also my armor has no effect its all 0 how do i get to the place where i fix the items so it has bonuses 1 more thing if i make every1 lvl 0 on moparscape they can still yell across the server that is all i need help with

item.title: Need my questions answered now
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Use a different client.
Moparscape client is very out-dated.

Read full topic

@hey_w8_u_nub wrote:

You using the moparscape client…? if you do, you can’t edit it… get a source and run a server

Read full topic

item.title: Need my questions answered now
item.dc:creator: @monkeykid300 monkeykid300
item.description:
@monkeykid300 wrote:

1.Go on your characters file.
2.Go to your character skills section.
3.change the 0’s to 999999999 (9’9s)
4.Change the xp to 14610000.
5.If I messed up with the last part find the ::master command in your client.
6.Use that amount of xp to change your levels.

Note:This will leave you with an always one shot kill. So if you like pking you’ll have to change the nine 9’s to just 99.

Read full topic
